STREAM.TITLE: Streams
STREAM.NAME: Name
STREAM.NAME_HINT: Must fit display, so max. 10 chars.
STREAM.EARL_HINT: Must start with http(s):// and be a direct stream URL and no playlist(m3u). No special characters.

WIFI.TITLE: WiFi
WIFI.NAME: SSID
WIFI.HINT: Attention: WiFi can be changed here. All inputs must be accurate (lower/upper case, ...), otherwise the radio cannot be reachable anymore. Current credentials are hidden for security reason.

ERROR.TITLE: Error
ERROR.WIFI_INVALID: Validation error. SSID/Password invalid or empty. Allowed chars: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, Leerzeichen, äÄöÖüÜß_-.
ERROR.STREAMS_SIZE: At least 1 and max 50 streams must be defined.
ERROR.STREAMS_NAME: Stream name invalid. Max 10 and no special characters.
ERROR.STREAMS_URL: Stream URL invalid. Must start with http(s):// and no special characters allowed.
